attributes.action: reintroduce National Service for all 18 to 21 year olds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reintroducing National Service would teach our young people discipline and give them something in life to aim for. This would also lessen petty crime and reaffirm good manners, it would also lessen the burden on the Social Security system.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
